dcterms:description: The Penn Discourse Treebank provides a low-level discourse annotation on written texts, focusing on implicit discourse relations between adjacent sentences.
dcterms:title: Penn Discourse Treebank

dcterms:creator: John J Godfrey
Edward C Holliman
Jane McDaniel
dcterms:description: The Switchboard Dialog Act Corpus is annotated on the Switchboard Corpus of human-human conversational telephone speech, labeling each utterance with one of 42 possible speech acts.
dcterms:title: Switchboard Dialog Act Corpus
